Description:
Job Purpose:First line of kitchens, starting of cleaning the workspace, preparing meal’s ingredients and to make sure it’s fresh and clean.Areas of Contribution and Related Responsibilities:Kitchen Workers is divided into (2) groups, a group which prepare salads, subs and sandwiches and a group which prepare the dough and the ingredients on top of it (Like Pizza) to be sent to the Oven Workers.
Packs food items neatly into the proper package/bag.
Designs the food refrigerator and self-service sections periodically during the shift.
Cuts, slices, and shreds cold cuts.
Maintains an attractive, neat, and clean kitchen always.
Secures all required equipment, supplies, materials and/or items to carry on properly with his/her job duties.
Prepares orders according to the customer's preference using proper portions and methods.
Keeps workstation clean, sanitized, and well organized.
Observes work schedules, and carries on all assigned duties conscientiously.
Despite the repetitive nature of job tasks, tries to be as creative and enthusiastic as possible.
Performs other duties pertinent to this job as assigned.Communications and Working Relationships:Interacts with clients and shows willingness to serve them with a pleasant attitude
Communicate professionally with the supervisor in charge.Skills
Skills:
Team player.
Enjoys working with people.
Warm, friendly personality.
Responsible and conscientious personality.
Ability and willingness to perform under stress.
At least 3 years of experience that is directly related to the duties and responsibilities specified.
English Language: Read, speak, and write.
